description: Windproof, light as a feather, can be packed up small and with all the benefits of the finest merino wool: with the windbreaker jacket for menmen even the strongest summit wind cannot blow you off course, whether you are mountaineering or climbing. The new generation of windbreakers not only offers an ergonomic fit, but also contain merino protect – in the front, on the back and under the arms. The fine merino fibers of this breathable, moisture-regulating and windproof material noticeably optimize the body climate. The sleeves, sides and hood of the jacket are made from super lightweight, windproof tec stretch material, which perfectly mirrors your every movement. A pfc-free, water-resistant dwr coating protects against light drizzle. True minimalists wish to reduce weight but not function – that’s why our hoods, elastic cuffs and waistbands are all pre-adjusted. The jacket can be fully packed away into its practical breast pocket with an extra loop, and then attached to a belt, belt loop or backpack. The merino windbreaker jacket for men is the perfect companion for true minimalists who want reduced weight and maximum function. It is a reliable, protective allrounder and light enough to carry with you wherever, whenever.
name: Ortovox Windbreaker Jacket - Mens
